attributes.action: Answer the question specifically about the leadership of student Christan Unions and student political parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a recent petition the government were asked  "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Defend the right of Christian Unions to control who may come into leadership of them."
The answer given only referred to who may come into Christian Unions and said nothing about who leads them. It made no reference to who may join student political parties and lead them.
We now therefore petition the Prime Minister to answer this question, making reference to the right of student political parties to control their leadership.
